title: Delicious Burger Recipe
text:
500g ground beef
4 hamburger buns
4 slices of cheddar cheese
1 tomato, sliced
Lettuce leaves
1 onion, sliced
Ketchup, mustard, and mayonnaise
Salt and pepper to taste





Prepare the Ingredients:

Slice the tomato and onion.
Wash the lettuce leaves.

Shape the Patties:

Season the ground beef with salt and pepper.
Divide the beef into four equal portions and shape into patties.

Cook the Patties:

Heat a grill or skillet over medium-high heat.
Cook the patties for about 4 minutes on each side or until desired doneness.

Assemble the Burgers:

Toast the buns lightly on the grill or skillet.
Spread ketchup, mustard, and mayonnaise on the buns.
Place a patty on each bun bottom, top with a slice of cheese, tomato, onion, and lettuce.
Cover with the bun tops.






Serve the burgers with a side of french fries or a fresh salad.
Enjoy with a cold beer or a soft drink.




Per Serving: - Calories: 600 - Protein: 40g - Carbohydrates: 45g - Fat: 30g
